h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Tiger Vanguard
content: When at last the Tiger Vanguard is finally beaten by your attacks, he’ll turn to stone and crumble away. The headless musician will reappear, and return Sun Wukong’s legendary stone form back to the Destined One, giving you the **Rock Solid Spell**! This is your one big defensive parry, taking the place of Cloud Step to completely negate and incoming attack when timed right, and will stagger the enemy to open them up for attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Tiger Vanguard'.
The content is as follows:
When at last the Tiger Vanguard is finally beaten by your attacks, he’ll turn to stone and crumble away. The headless musician will reappear, and return Sun Wukong’s legendary stone form back to the Destined One, giving you the **Rock Solid Spell**! This is your one big defensive parry, taking the place of Cloud Step to completely negate and incoming attack when timed right, and will stagger the enemy to open them up for attack.
